column2: an A.M. Eatery////We also ordered the Benny Goodman
column3: and what a great dish it was! It included smoked salmon
column6: and a wonderfully poached egg. The other eggs benedict dish we ordered was a Benny Duo. We combined an order of the harvest eggs benedict and the chilaquiles eggs benedict. Of the three
column7: my husband and I liked the Benny Goodman the most.
